instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to /app/frontend/public/index.html or /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'Outfit' and 'Inter' font families and the custom color palette defined above.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' to match the friendly/modern aesthetic.
4. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Bento Grid' style hero section using the provided hero images. Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations.
5. DASHBOARD: Create a clean, sidebar-layout dashboard. Use the 'dashboard' background color (#f8fafc) for the main area and white for cards.
6. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the 'glass' card style for floating elements or overlays on the landing page.
7. GRADIENTS: Use the defined gradients for text highlights and primary buttons to add the requested 'color'.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) has a unique data-testid attribute (e.g., 'login-submit-btn', 'hero-cta').
9. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx extensions as per the existing project structure. Do not create .tsx files.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text blocks without visual interest.
Use 2-3x more padding than standard. Whitespace is luxury.
Micro-interactions are mandatory. Hover states must be visible and delightful.
Dark mode is for the Landing Page (optional but recommended for impact), Light mode is for the Dashboard (for usability).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #09090b or similar tinted blacks.
